column4: I have 320Gb of hd. If I re-install 32bits, I can repartition it as I want. Should I make the whole thing Linux and run Windows apps ONLY in VirtualBox, or should I keep myself a small partition for Vista or XP ?
you should consider running windows in qemu or vmware
ext3 is what you want to be using for your partitions in linux yes.
there is one difference between linux and windows however, in linux, you need another partition, a swap partition which should be 1.5 to 2 times the size of your RAM.
